title: The Elephant in the room.
body:
Every now and then, there comes a skin that is just the elephant in the room, the perfect skin for a champ, and everyone sits there wondering 
"why isn't this already a thing?" but no one does anything about it.

Previously we have had Skins like Gravelord Azir and Bloodmoon Yasuo, skins that make perfect thematical sense for that champ and the ideas were around for ages by fans and artists, but for some reason took ages to come into the game.

Well this is the current 'Elephant in the room' skin:

Elderwood Kindred. The perfect skin for Kindred, lets get this one made!

The idea has been around for a while, but instead of Elderwood Kindred, they made Super Galaxy Kindred, which really doesn't fit her theme anywhere near as well as Elderwood. (don't get me wrong, super galaxy, is an awesome skin! its cool seeing a new sci-fi/Gurren lagaan take on kindred, and i cant wait for it!! but despite all its awesome aspects it still doesn't make as much sense as Elderwood.)

(BTW I did not draw the picture, i wish i did, i wish i could, but i didn't. And i can't. I don't know who did. But they get full credit.) 

What do you guys think?

PS. Obviously i didn't come up with the idea, I'm just giving it some more publicity, so it doesn't get forgotten.

replies.body:
I'd hardly call that an elephant in the room.
and a better example of a perfectly fitting skin would've been surprise party fiddlesticks.
I suppose it depends on what room you're in.

An "Elephant in the room" for me, (not really thematically, but visually,) would be Bloodmoon Kindred, and Bloodmoon Jhin. I legit thought they were planning these when they released Bloodmoon Kennen and Bloodmoon Yasuo. It hasn't even been a Bloodmoon since the first wave, and they miss a perfect opportunity.  

I mean they already have the masks.

Blood Moon skins are reserved for Ionian champs and their portrayal of Shadow Isles champs in the thematic cannon. Jhin/Kindred aren't either so the chance of them getting a BM skin is basically nil. But I agree they would make cool skins.

I wanna see more Bloodstone skins, I reckon they could do a lot more with them.

Jhin is an Ionian champ.

And Thresh/Kalista/Elise arent.  Neither is Zilean, who is not Ionian or shadow isles related.

I must confess I only skimmed Jhin's lore. Thresh/Kali and Elise are all Shadow Isles.

I believe Zilean had some connection to Ionia, but it's been a while so I could be wrong about that.

Jhin is Ionian through and through, You said Bloodmoon was reserved for 'ionian champs to portrey shadow isles' not shadow isles champs.

And it doesn't mention anything in Zilean's lore about ionia, but like a lot of champions, Zilean's lore is no longer canon.

>  and their portrayal of Shadow Isles champs

As in, the Shadow Isles champs appearing how they are represented in Ionian lore. I.E Ionian champs AND Shadows Isle's champs.

Zilean is the exception I agree. My knowledge of Jhin's lore is basically creepy serial killer with a thing for the number four.

The real elephant in the Room has been reworked Yorick.

2011 Soon TM.

At least it's finally been confirmed... Oh hey Ryze :                           ^)

It kinda ruins the whole "lamb and wolf" vibe the champion has in my opinion, nice try though
